cards.text: * One easy way to convert a text to an array of numbers is by using a technique named {{c1:: Bag of Words}} which consist of {{c2:: converting every word in the vocabulary into an index, and then a sentence is 0 or 1 depending if the word exist }} {{id: 00094e21-2a39-459c-ba66-4dfdaa60eee9}} [[FlashCard]]
* With an spare representation a logistic regression model will need to learn {{c1:: n+1}} parameters where n is the size of the vocabulary {{id: 42c5aae1-b1e1-4321-84f8-920c9d80175f }} [[FlashCard]]
- Capital of Costa rica is {{c1:: San Jose}} {{id: CostaRica [[July 22nd, 2020]]}}[[FlashCard]]
- Capital of Papua New Guinea is {{c1:: Port Moresby}} {{id: Papua[[July 22nd, 2020]]}} [[FlashCard]]
